Text: Chirnside Park Shopping Centre:  It is situated approximately 32 kilometres east-north-east of the Melbourne CBD.

<Text: Chirnside Park Shopping Centre:  The shopping centre opened in 1979 as a small convenience shopping centre which has grown over the years, opening businesses such as Kmart, Target, Woolworths, Coles and Reading Cinemas.>
